cause.description:
We want to reduce the number of infected people in aids and mostly in West Africa, where AIDS passes the the 50% rate of the population.
We have many goals to reach, and many people to save.
We also want to help in the research to find a cure to such cruel disease.
Bless you all
1. STOP AIDS
cause.mission: Minimize the number of people infected with aids, and try to prevent it.
cause.name: STOP AIDS
